titleStmt.title: A review of the Observations upon some of His Majesties late answers and expresses written by A Gentleman of Quality.
titleStmt.author: Diggs, Dudley, 1613-1643.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Dudley Diggs. cf. NUC pre-1956.

This defense of the divine right of kings, in reply to Henry Parker's "Observations", 1642 has been attributed to Diggs by DWB and Wood-Bliss, Athenae Oxonienses, but the attribution is doubted by Madan on reasonable grounds and is not to be confused with Digg's "An answer to a printed book", 1642.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
